name: PC Hockey League
description:
PC Hockey League is the newest and best hockey experience brought to PC! Experience intense, action packed 3-on-3 gameplay! Through team work, offensive and defensive skills battle your way to be the best in the league.


Three action packed periods of 3 on 3 ice hockey! Compete against other teams to prove your the best! Master all the unique controls designed for PC gameplay unlike any sports game before.


Join a PCHL team or create your own! Squad up and play against other teams to compete and be the best. Customize your teams colours, names and logo to show off your style on the ice as a team!


Every player is unique, characters are customizable so you can represent yourself! Pick your favourite jersey number and have your last name on your jersey.


As an indie dev, I am devoted to creating a great experience for everyone! I am open to any feedback or suggestions to keep the game in prime condition! Visit the discord to discuss the game or to give any suggestions and feedback.

Join The Discord: https://discord.gg/egBPM9e7Sz
